original_title: Matara District final result: NPP wins 6 seats, SJB secures one
original_body_lines: The Election Commission of Sri Lanka has released the final results of the Matara District in the 2024 General Election with the National People’s Power (NPP) polling more than 69% of the total votes in the district.
NPP has polled 317,541 votes to win the district while the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) is second with 74,475 votes (16.38%).
Accordingly, the NPP has secured 6 seats in the district while the SJB have won one seat in the district.
